method: **Unlock POF:** Tutorial at Ardougne Farm (North of Lodestone).
tips: Feed Rabbits woad leaves (buy from Wyson in Falador Park).
Keep breeding rabbits for the totem perk (+breeding chance). Raise Chickens for better XP at 28.
Sheep eat Woad Leaves (Cheap). Raise them in the Medium Pen.
Cows eat Woad Leaves. Very cheap XP.
Chinchompas are the best Small Pen XP. Treat them as the meta for Small Pens until 120.
Spiders replace Sheep/Zygomites until 81. Feed them seeds or meat.
Yaks replace Cows. Feed them Woad Leaves.
Zygomites are the best Medium Pen XP. Feed them Mushrooms (Mort Myre Fungi).
Dragons are the best Large Pen XP. Green (92), Blue (94), Red (96), Black (99). Feed them Meat.

method: **Ranch Out of Time:** Frogs (42), Salamanders (54), Jadinkos (81), Varanusaur (99).
tips: Use the Anachronia farm alongside Ardougne for maximum XP.
